website_summaries.verdict: A sound choice if you want attractive flame tip bulbs and bright light.
pros: Stands out for emitting extra-bright LED light
The light is also very white
Flame tips add a pretty accent
cons: The flame tip design makes them taller than other candelabra styles
In some situations, this could be impractical

customer_reviews.title: So bright, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have one fixture in my house that uses these candelabra bulbs. I am slowly replacing all the bulbs in my house with bright white daylight bulbs.They burn bright and cool to the touch. I absolutely love the look it gives the house. I was wanting to paint all the walls because they were looking a little yellow, but I realized that was just the tint of my lights. It's amazing what a different it makes. Great product. Hoping this will save a little money on the power bill as well! I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Macy

customer_reviews.title: Blue color
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are about half an inch taller than the similar incandescent bulbs and a little wider. The glass shades are 8" tall for reference. If I had known the blue hue was so dramatically different and that they had such a modern look (1920s craftsman style home) I might have went with a different brand. I am happy that I will be saving money though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: REALLY bright
customer_reviews.text: Here’s a picture of me standing in the room with the LED bulbs vs looking out onto the hallway with a traditional light fixture. I can’t believe how affordable these were relative to other brands. I got the daylight bulbs for my walk in closet because I was worried the soft yellow would be too dark or make my clothes look yellow. It is REALLY bright and white, like I’m standing in direct sunlight. I am going to order soft white and maybe do half and half in my fixture. It’s honestly a bit much for first thing when I wake up.
customer_reviews.author: BeccTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with dimmer circuits (even when not dimmed)
customer_reviews.text: Made other lights in the house flicker. It's possible that this is because they were installed in a circuit that uses a dimmer (but were not dimmed). I don't have a non-dimmable circuit that accepts this type of bulb to test this theory, nor am I interested in removing the dimmer switch. I contacted the manufacturer but never received a response after about 3 months. Another issue with these is when trying to remove them, the bulb itself came unscrewed instead of it unscrewing from the socket. I'm giving it two stars because I did like how bright they were and there is a good chance that my dimmer circuit is to blame for the flickering.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Pehrson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to brighten up a room
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I don’t normally get excited about light bulbs but these are fantastic! I converted our formal dining room into my sewing room which meant it had a chandelier in the middle of the room. Eventually several bulbs burned out so when I went to replace them, I checked to see if there was anything brighter. Before I couldn’t sew in the evening because the room just wasn’t bright enough but now I can sew any time of the day. I will definitely be using these again.
customer_reviews.author: BCB

customer_reviews.title: Yippy i can see again.
customer_reviews.text: Finally have real light coming from my dining room chandelier. I love these bulbs! I lived with dim lighting for 20 years. I'm very happy with them. And think they are attractive too. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Yazdani

customer_reviews.title: Work great, great price, but man are they long!
customer_reviews.text: Quite bright, 6000k color (very white) which is what I wanted. I was surprised at the overall length, even though I checked it against existing bulbs and knew it was longer. I put these in a ceiling fan light fixture and they work great! They are NOT dimmable, but my fans/lights are not set up that way so all good there. They do stick out a bit from the fan but that's not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha Bill 77

customer_reviews.title: Careful to measure in some fixtures.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice bright bulbs but quite long. About an 1 1/4 inch longer than the bulbs I replaced in my ceiling fan. With my fixture they barely fit because the tips are so long. If you have an exposed light with no globe or cover then no problem, but they may not fit easily in many light fixtures. That said, the bulbs are nice looking and have cool white light output.
customer_reviews.author: A. CONARD

customer_reviews.title: White light and very bright!
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and white light. Bright and does the job. The housing is made of seemingly cheap plastic but thats fine. The shipping was fast also. I will update this review if the bulbs burn out fast in the next few months. Im expecting years of life since these are LEDs.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Danny Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Why are they still selling these?
customer_reviews.text: Well, the electrician just left. These bulbs melted the transformer in my ceiling fan. Supposedly, these are 60w equivalent bulbs, but only using 7 watts. Transformer is rated for 300 watts, so 4 of them shouldn't be a problem, even if it does draw 60... The transformer is smoked and the housing started to melt.
customer_reviews.author: C. Belson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely phenomenal customer service
customer_reviews.text: The kind of customer service these gals/guys provide is part of what makes Amazon so great. Very impressed. The product also appears to be of excellent quality so far. Very bright led bulbs. Attached photo taken midday (obviously).
customer_reviews.author: Channabanana

customer_reviews.title: Candlebra Led bulbs
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Bulbs were delivered in good time. They are bright and look nice. Time will tell if they last long. I have started dating the bulbs, by writing the install date on them with a sharpy pen. Some led bulbs I've installed only last a few months, others are now going on 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright light
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright light. They're much larger than the regular candelabra bulbs but look good against our brushed nickel chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: Nom de Plume

customer_reviews.title: Woo! Bright light!
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly! These are super bright! I bought them for a chandelier that I feared might be too dim for my dining area. With these bulbs, the chandelier is quite bright. So bright that I wish these were dimmable so I could install a dimmer switch.
customer_reviews.author: tBotTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Ordered daylight white but the actual come is cool white. I have daylight white LED bulbs in ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered daylight white but the actual come is cool white. I have daylight white LED bulbs in a neighboring fixture so the different colors cast competing and unpleasant light. The bulbs themselves are great-just disappointed in the color/ description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: one star - to 3 star because of customer service refund
customer_reviews.text: one of the 6 bulbs doesn't function! Update: LEDMO refunded the cost of the bulbs minus the return shipping costs. I would have rather had received a replacement bulb, however, the customer service was at least decent enough to refund the costs.
customer_reviews.author: robnick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: THEy are nice looking but don't fit in the fixture.... strange.. **Edit to add- I had originally gave them 1 star because they didn't fit my fixture... I just found out that the fixture I bought actually takes e14 base and was no fault to this company that I overlooked that. Their customer service was excellent and kind and they issued me a refund. I changed my rating to 5 stars ! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: sinnersaved

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 6 bulbs work
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs look great and are bright. Unfortunately only 3 out of the 6 that I received work. Update: The seller completely stands behind there product and gave me a full refund for the inconvenience. I think the issue was probably shipping or a bad batch of bulbs. I will be ordering me a new pack as these lights are beautiful and very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Courtesy D

customer_reviews.title: Quick arrival.
customer_reviews.text: I love that the LED lights really lit up the room...where no corner was in the dark. I bought them for the master bedroom but my husband hated them. So I put them over the stairs instead... where he can hate them all he wants because they're staying!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good light bulbs - these are day light ones.
customer_reviews.text: Good light bulbs. I ordered two pack. The only reason I am giving 4 star is because 2 light bulb went bad after few days of use. Great Amazon service they shipped me replacement with next day delivery. I have used them in ceiling fan light kit.
customer_reviews.author: Divya

customer_reviews.title: The brightest of white
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are very bright and very white/blue (cold). Much too bright and cold for my corner space. Good bulbs if you are looking for that.
customer_reviews.author: Josh D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: When I put the lights on I couldn't believe the difference. We had regular candelabra bulbs and they gave off a yellow tint. The new bulbs are super bright and white lighting instead of the yellow tint. The new lights make my chandelier look more expensive. I'm a very happy camper!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aline

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I've been looking for!!! These lights are very bright, which is the perfect scale of lighting for my new chandelier in the dining room. It brightens up the entire room...very nicely! I will be ordering more to keep at hand before I'm unable to find them again and before the price goes up...lol!
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Weird light color, way too bright
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs were very pretty shaped, but they very a very strange blue ish light. Do not buy if you have a light fixture wi H no cover over the bulb....they hurt your eyes! They photograph well, actually, so the picture I have attached looks great. Totally worth it if they are covered!
customer_reviews.author: JK Carter

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise
customer_reviews.text: A pleasant surprise. Were not to sure about them when I first opened the package. They were so different from the original bulbs we had in the candelbra. After getting used to the difference in the lighting we are very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. Used in an 8 light candelabra to simulate daylight in an art room. Worked better than expected. Awesome pricing. Flame tips look nice. Bulbs are longer than standard candelabra bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: spock80

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: 3 out of 6 bulbs were last slightly over 2 years. I would expect them to last longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Watch the size/length of the bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived very quickly. Bulbs are very bright as they are described. Pay very close attention to the fact that they have extremely long tips. I did not pay attention, therefore they will not fit into the ceiling fan dome that I bought them for. Still a very good product that I found another use for
customer_reviews.author: John Ware

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED! - NON-DIMMABLE
customer_reviews.text: No wear in the description does it say non-dimmable. So now I have lights that may or may not work the way I want them to. I will contact the company and see about send them back. VERY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Don92

customer_reviews.title: They are good in color (6000K) and look decent
customer_reviews.text: These things a bright. They are good in color (6000K) and look decent. All of them worked out of box. They come on instantly, unlike some LEDs that have a short delay. I'd buy them again if I ever needed any more.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was good. The bulbs (I ordered 36) were all intact
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived as expected. The packaging was good. The bulbs (I ordered 36) were all intact. They by simple exam appear intact and durable. I did not rate the bulbs higher as time will determine my overall rating. If they die in the near future I would demote my rating to 1/2 star and if they last the hoped for 10 years I would raise the rating to a 5/5
customer_reviews.author: RDM

customer_reviews.title: Do not bother
customer_reviews.text: Some arrived cracked or broken entirely. The first one I put in a lamp stuck in the socket and pulled apart when I tried to remove it. Very nice bright white light, but bulb gets very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great price, arrived when promised, very bright!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Exactly what we needed for our candelabra light in the breakfast nook. 6 bulbs in the package, exactly what we needed. Very bright and now I don't mind using it as the power usage for all 6 is just a little over what just 1 of the old incandescent bulbs where. Totally satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ward

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Prompt shipping, excellent packaging. Product is very good and cheaper than local big box national store. I converted whole house to LED and daily KWH dropped 50% immediately.
customer_reviews.author: FREETELEVISION

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 pack 1 year ago, and 4 of the bulbs have stopped working since then. Given that LED bulbs are supposed to last for years, this product is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: NH Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed !!
customer_reviews.text: Very very disappointing. First the wrong items were sent.Descriptions says daylight white 6000k, but received soft white 2800k. Bought a second time thinking first time was just a fluke, to my surprise the second order was incorrect was well.The description is completely incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bright Neutral Light
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this bulbs! They are a very bright white light. Not yellow or blue!! So MUCH better than old candelabra bulbs!! Great price too!!
customer_reviews.author: artMom

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: These are ridiculously bright! The picture is of a single bulb. I'm actually going to have to order some different bulbs because 8 of these will be way too bright. If you need an intense source of light, these are what you're looking for. Absolutely fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great light bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with light output. Much brighter than expected a 7 watt bulb could ever be. Save money every day with these bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Edgemon

customer_reviews.title: White color is too harsh for me
customer_reviews.text: Product works just fine. I'd give it 5 stars but the white color is too harsh for me. Not their fault, but I took one star off. I'm ordering some soft white lights instead.
customer_reviews.author: GFK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brightness also my wife looking for daylight Perfect all ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brightness also my wife looking for daylight Perfect all around . now we need see how long it work , says 10 yrs
customer_reviews.author: Chandan Manika Ghosh

customer_reviews.title: I love how bright they are- without being painful on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how bright they are- without being painful on the eyes. I wanted something to radiate a daylight type of light for the small rooms that I have these in, and these fit the purpose. I hope they last as long as they claim.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: I give them five stars for very bright, and ...
customer_reviews.text: I give them five stars for very bright, and giving the amount of light that I needed. I only Deducted one star because of their appearance. The silver threads show, and my chandeliers is gold.. They should be a little thinner, and have an option of a different red on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Rightmire

customer_reviews.title: Buy these if you need super bright light!!
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t need super bright white light you may want to get something else or pair with a lower wattage. I used these in a bathroom chandelier and I’m pretty sure I could land a 747 in my backyard at midnight..
customer_reviews.author: Tami G.

customer_reviews.title: I put the led lights in the light over my ...
customer_reviews.text: I put the led lights in the light over my garage and they are three times as bright as the ones that were in the light. It took all six lights in the lamps. Not only does it light up my driveway, it also lights up my whole yard on both side in front of my house. My wife loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Works great... exactly what i wanted... delieved when said! This is the second time ordering this type bulb and when i need them again... i will definitely use them again.
customer_reviews.author: michael J B

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: Very awesome light bulbs have a great day light output
customer_reviews.author: Jose R. Leal

customer_reviews.title: Burned out within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine, albeit very long length that stuck out of fixture. Nice bright light. However, half of them are already burned out & it hasn't even been months. Used abt 1-2 hours per day max in bathroom vanity light.
customer_reviews.author: W.

customer_reviews.title: Have only had them about a week and like them fine but don't know about longevity
customer_reviews.text: Have only had them about a week and like them fine but don't know about longevity. They are very bright in our yard light which we like very much.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Blueish/purple lights. And no, it's not a cool white light. 2 of them are flickering at the 1 year mark.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! These balls took a dimly lit room and made it a bright spot in my home and I am extremely happy with them!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! These balls took a dimly lit room and made it a bright spot in my home and I am extremely happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: steve shrader

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bulbs. The light from these makes my room look bright and the the hallway dingy compared to the hallway lighting. because of This I have begun purchasing all new lights to try and match the light given off by theses bulbs...I have come close but still love the way the colors of my room look now.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: We love these.
customer_reviews.text: Much brighter than the standard bulbs for the chandelier, and cooler to operate. We love these.
customer_reviews.author: chryssmt

customer_reviews.title: Bright and white!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy! We had a ceiling fan that kept blowing bulbs. I was scared it would burn our house down. I ordered these bulbs problem solved. Just needed led bulbs. Now I'm going to start replacing the rest of the house
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Salyer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly impressed
customer_reviews.text: They're not pretty in the package, they're definitely not manufactured in the USA, but they're bright and consistently colored and not one single LED has failed since I put these in my kitchen chandelier months ago.
customer_reviews.author: West Bank Firefighter

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Great lights. Wife hated seeing that much of a metallic base. Second set ordered. They flicker after a year. Very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Robert From NY

customer_reviews.title: nice bright in our office though the color is too ...
customer_reviews.text: nice bright in our office though the color is too harsh for me...go with warmer color pay attention to this part....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: hese work great and are actually nice looking (for a light bulb).
customer_reviews.text: These work great and are actually nice looking (for a light bulb). That said be sure to note these are cool white and not warm white.
customer_reviews.author: BFL

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Seems to be of good quality. Bright light that stays cool and should save on electric bill
customer_reviews.author: Fauzia Iqbal

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these bulbs for 3 years & they are going strong! Energy efficient & can be dimmable.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M.

customer_reviews.title: Bright!!
customer_reviews.text: Bright LED lights as expected with blue white light - so much brighter than I expected and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Angclikel

customer_reviews.title: Look great when turned on
customer_reviews.text: Look great when turned on. Don't like the big silver bases but knew they were there when I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Gray

customer_reviews.title: They are bright!
customer_reviews.text: We received our order quickly. Great seller. Unfortunately, I have now learned that daylight bulbs are not for me. One of the bulbs worked for only a short time. The rest are fine but I will be buying other bulbs because I don’t care for ‘daylight’.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright white and clear up the entire room
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what I bought for. I have 3 chandeliers in my jewelry shop. As soon as I replaced these bulbs the room was brighten up and the chandelier itself also clear up like diamonds. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Diamonshop

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find Candelabra base and VERY bright.
customer_reviews.text: VERY bright. Work very well and the candelabra bases are very difficult to find in the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Good for what they are but wished I had ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Good for what they are but wished I had ordered dimming. Just saying for candelabra I didn't check. They are on or off only.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Shultz

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs. Had to return 2 of the 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bulbs. Had to return 2 of the 6 in one of the packs because the base on them were warped. AMAZON quickly shipped a new set. Works great! Love the daylight look!
customer_reviews.author: Ammi P Chades

customer_reviews.title: super white, super bright!
customer_reviews.text: I give these a 5 star because they worked perfectly. I give myself 1 star because I failed to realize I ordered the bright white/daylight bulbs when I meant to get the softwhite ones LOL
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Amazing - Ho-hum to WOW lighting
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the incandescent bulbs in our chandelier and now the chandelier "POPS" with incredibly white daylight light. Had I known how much of a difference it makes, I would have done this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: D.B.H.

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that I can have LED bulbs like ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I can have LED bulbs like this in my ceiling fan. Price was reasonable, delivery was quick and they were packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Q

customer_reviews.title: Super bright and look great!
customer_reviews.text: By far the brightest bulbs in our house. Have 8 installed on a chandelier and had now the one chandelier lights up half the house. Great priduct!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy E

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy with these lights and will order them again
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with these lights and will order them again. They are everything that I hoped for, bright and very efficient. We've used them for a few weeks and they have transformed our kitchen! Before it was too dark and we used 5 of these bulbs in a light and the difference is dramatic!! We love our kitchen now and it was these little led lights that changed everything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some came damaged but seller quickly replaced the damaged items.
customer_reviews.text: Two of the 6 bulbs arrived damaged. The tops of the bulbs broken off. No damage to the box so this has to be a mfg issue.
customer_reviews.author: buzz1954

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of light...
customer_reviews.text: Installed 5 of these in my closet ceiling light fixture and it vastly improve the lighting in there! These LED bulbs work well and save electricity over the previous CFL bulb fixture that was replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bulbs, very bright and great price. Super fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Best price for Daylight LED bulbs of this specification
customer_reviews.text: Best price for Daylight LED bulbs of this specification. 3 bulbs to the ceiling fan provides sufficient lighting for the entire room. Very happy with this purchase! Have been using these for 6 months and no problems of early failure so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sudhakar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Meets my every expectation & the speed shipping was also excellant.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Rolfes II

customer_reviews.title: Hurts my eyes!!
customer_reviews.text: These are SUPER bright if you like that sort of light - I do not.. these hurt my eyes looking at them, would return if it didn’t cost $6.90 in shipping! 😕
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: They work great and the light they emit is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was worried these wouldn't fit because the look more bulky than the standard ones that come with the ceiling fan I purchased, but not at all. They work great and the light they emit is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: igv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Bulbs arrived in good condition. Perfect fit. Happy with the light output
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Allender

customer_reviews.title: Great buy if looking for brighter bulb.
customer_reviews.text: Added a lot of light to walk in closet. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Chris Walton

customer_reviews.title: Bright Bright Bright!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately theses were too long, but the seller has went above and beyond to get us the ones that will work. They have been awesome. I will say these are so bright, which we love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Super bright!
customer_reviews.text: These are as bright as day!! No hint of yellow whatsoever. Super bright!
customer_reviews.author: Athena Bartels

customer_reviews.title: so they won't look good on your dining room chandelier
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are very very bright. The color is almost white, not yellow. The bulbs themselves are constructed with a wide metal band, so they won't look good on your dining room chandelier, but I use mine hanging from the entryway, and they look great from below, and the light they give off is phenominal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these they bright up the room. Great price and quick delivery
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: These are BRIGHT! I have a light fixture requiring ...
customer_reviews.text: These are BRIGHT! I have a light fixture requiring 8 bulbs but just 4 bulbs was more than enough lighting!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with some bulbs and they took care of it right away. Would shop again!
customer_reviews.author: skooP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, as described
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered these twice! They are exactly as described and fit in my chandelier as I had hoped. The second order, I received the wrong tip and wrong color, but customer service was very quick and compensated for the mistake. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Mattus

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: There longer than original bulbs and do not fit my fan light without taking off the clear lens and they are to white in color
customer_reviews.author: oaktrac

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but complements!
customer_reviews.text: These have such a pretty glow to them. We have had many friends and relatives complement us on them.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Iverson

customer_reviews.title: still working like new. Loving
customer_reviews.text: After a months of use, still working like new. Loving it
customer_reviews.author: Lurkz

customer_reviews.title: Lights up instantly and bright.  A little bigger than traditional Candelabra lights.
customer_reviews.text: Lights work great. Come on instantly and every true bright white. They are longer than other bulbs and do not fit in one fixture I have. The size is listed and sizing is correct. I didn't measure before hand so no blame to their product. The look good and the will use for other needs (if it fits)
customer_reviews.author: Bill Konecy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright but two of my bulbs didn't work upon arrival
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were the bright cool light I was hoping they would be. So glad I finally found them.
customer_reviews.author: terri blackshear

customer_reviews.title: only 7watts
customer_reviews.text: a 60 watt equivalent bulb that seems like a 100 watt
customer_reviews.author: dew-berg

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product and very bright
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product and very bright! Highly suggest this product for anyone who needs a lot of clean light!
customer_reviews.author: Chris&Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brightness for my room
customer_reviews.text: The product is just as expected. Perfect brightness for my room.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the old incandescent bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Have been running these bulbs for several months now. Much better than the old incandescent bulbs. I bought 2 packs and accidentally bought this daylight white pack instead of 2 warmer color packs. I have to say, me thw warmer bulbs seem to brighten my room a lot better. But the daylight white has it's benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Huckleberry

customer_reviews.title: Great light.
customer_reviews.text: Love how much brighter these are. I have a pool table under them and I can see my table much better without having to install different lights.
customer_reviews.author: Max power

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bright white light, led placement a little funky, but they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Raleigh
